verses.verse: For the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> to a man <S%G444><s%> that is an <S%G3617>householder,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1821>went<s%> out early <S%G260><s%> <S%G4404><s%> in the morning to <S%G3409>hire<s%> <S%G2040>laborers<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his vineyard. <S%G290><s%>
And when he had <S%G4856>agreed<s%> with the <S%G2040>laborers<s%> for a <S%G1220>penny<s%> a <S%G2250>day,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> his vineyard. <S%G290><s%>

And he <S%G1821>went<s%> out <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G692>idle<s%> in the marketplace, <S%G58><s%>

And <S%G2036>said<s%> to them; <S%G5217>Go<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G290>vineyard,<s%> and whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> is <S%G1342>right<s%> I will give you. And they <S%G565>went<s%> their way.
<S%G3825>Again<s%> he <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> and <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and <S%G4160>did<s%> likewise. <S%G5615><s%>

And <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G1734>eleventh<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> he <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G692>idle,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> you <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> idle? <S%G692><s%>

They <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, <S%G3754>Because<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> has <S%G3409>hired<s%> us. He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5217>Go<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G290>vineyard;<s%> and whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> is right, <S%G1342><s%> that shall you receive. <S%G2983><s%>

<S%G1161>So<s%> when <S%G3798>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> the <S%G2962>lord<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to his <S%G2012>steward,<s%> <S%G2564>Call<s%> the <S%G2040>laborers,<s%> and <S%G591>give<s%> them their <S%G3408>hire,<s%> <S%G756>beginning<s%> from the <S%G2078>last<s%> to the first. <S%G4413><s%>
And when they <S%G2064>came<s%> that were <S%G3409>hired<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G1734>eleventh<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> they <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G303>every<s%> man a penny. <S%G1220><s%>

But when the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> they <S%G3543>supposed<s%> that they should have <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G4119>more;<s%> and they <S%G2532>likewise<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G303>every<s%> man a penny. <S%G1220><s%>
And when they had received <S%G2983><s%> it, they <S%G1111>murmured<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G3611>manager<s%> of the house, <S%G3617><s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> have worked <S%G4160><s%> but <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and you have <S%G4160>made<s%> them <S%G2470>equal<s%> to us, <S%G3588>which<s%> have <S%G941>borne<s%> the <S%G922>burden<s%> and <S%G2742>heat<s%> of the day. <S%G2250><s%>

But he <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2083>Friend,<s%> I <S%G91>do<s%> you <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G91>wrong:<s%> did not you <S%G4856>agree<s%> with me for a penny? <S%G1220><s%>
Take <S%G142><s%> that your <S%G4674><s%> is, and <S%G5217>go<s%> your way: I <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G2078>last,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as to you.

Is it not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for me to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> with <S%G1699>my<s%> own? Is <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%> <S%G4190>evil,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> good? <S%G18><s%>

<S%G3779>So<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> shall be <S%G4413>first,<s%> and the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2078>last:<s%> for <S%G4183>many<s%> be <S%G2822>called,<s%> but <S%G3641>few<s%> chosen. <S%G1588><s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G305>going<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2596>apart<s%> <S%G2398><s%> in the <S%G3598>way,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them,

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> we <S%G305>go<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem;<s%> and the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> shall be <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and to the <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> and they shall <S%G2632>condemn<s%> him to death, <S%G2288><s%>

And shall <S%G3860>deliver<s%> him to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> to <S%G1702>mock,<s%> and to <S%G3146>whip,<s%> and to crucify <S%G4717><s%> him: and the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> he shall <S%G450>rise<s%> again. <S%G450><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedees<s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> with her <S%G5207>sons,<s%> <S%G4352>worshipping<s%> him, and <S%G154>desiring<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> thing of him.

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> you? She <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2036>Grant<s%> that <S%G3778>these<s%> my <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> may <S%G2523>sit,<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> your <S%G1188>right<s%> hand, and the <S%G1520>other<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the <S%G2176>left,<s%> in your <S%G932>kingdom.<s%>

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> You <S%G1492>know<s%> not <S%G5101>what<s%> you <S%G154>ask.<s%> Are you <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%> of the <S%G4221>cup<s%> that I shall <S%G4095>drink<s%> of, and to be <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> that I am <S%G907>baptized<s%> with? They <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, We are <S%G1410>able.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, You shall <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> of my <S%G4221>cup,<s%> and be <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> that I am <S%G907>baptized<s%> with: but to <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> my <S%G1188>right<s%> hand, and <S%G1537>on<s%> my <S%G2176>left,<s%> is not <S%G1699>my<s%> to <S%G1325>give,<s%> but it shall be given to them for <S%G3739>whom<s%> it is <S%G2090>prepared<s%> of my Father. <S%G3962><s%>
And when the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they were <S%G23>moved<s%> with <S%G23>indignation<s%> <S%G4012>against<s%> the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> them to him, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> You <S%G1492>know<s%> that the <S%G758>princes<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2634>exercise<s%> <S%G2634>dominion<s%> over them, and they that are <S%G3171>great<s%> <S%G2715>exercise<s%> <S%G2715>authority<s%> on them.

But it shall not be <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you: but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> be <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, let him be <S%G5216>your<s%> minister; <S%G1249><s%>
And whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> be <S%G4413>chief<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, let him be <S%G5216>your<s%> servant: <S%G1401><s%>

<S%G5618>Even<s%> as the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> not to be <S%G1247>ministered<s%> to, but to <S%G1247>minister,<s%> and to <S%G1325>give<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> a <S%G3083>ransom<s%> for many. <S%G4183><s%>
And as they <S%G1607>departed<s%> from <S%G2410>Jericho,<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> him.

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%> men <S%G2521>sitting<s%> by the <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G3844>side,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3855>passed<s%> by, <S%G2896>cried<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on us, O <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> you <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David.<s%>

And the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> them, <S%G2443>because<s%> they should <S%G4623>hold<s%> their <S%G4623>peace:<s%> but they <S%G2896>cried<s%> the <S%G3185>more,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on us, O <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> you <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2476>still,<s%> and <S%G5455>called<s%> them, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> you that I shall <S%G4160>do<s%> to you?
They <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that our <S%G3788>eyes<s%> may be <S%G455>opened.<s%>

<S%G1161>So<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G4697>compassion<s%> on them, and <S%G680>touched<s%> their <S%G3788>eyes:<s%> and <S%G2112>immediately<s%> their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G308>received<s%> <S%G308>sight,<s%> and they <S%G190>followed<s%> him.
